allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Next.js with Supabase template

Includes shadcn components reference for Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(python3 -c " import struct import sys msg = open\(''/tmp/test_msg.txt'', ''rb''\).read\(\) sys.stdout.buffer.write\(struct.pack\(''I'', len\(msg\)\)\) sys.stdout.buffer.write\(msg\) ")

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs add src/content/docs/bcms/astra-agency-setup.mdx src/content/docs/bricks-builder-agent/index.mdx src/content/docs/bricks-builder-agent/workflow.mdx src/content/docs/claude-code/index.mdx src/content/docs/cloudflare/docs-site-setup.mdx src/content/docs/documentation-workflow.mdx src/content/docs/wp-manager/bulk-updates.mdx src/content/docs/wp-manager/index.mdx src/content/docs/wp-manager/servers.mdx src/content/docs/xcloud/ssh-setup.mdx src/content/docs/xcloud/updating-docker-apps.mdx)

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Mermaid diagrams to all documentation pages

Convert 11 doc pages from .md to .mdx with interactive Mermaid diagrams:
- documentation-workflow: workflow and capture flow diagrams
- cloudflare/docs-site-setup: architecture and OAuth flow diagrams
- wp-manager/index: architecture and data flow diagrams
- wp-manager/bulk-updates: update flow and execution diagrams
- wp-manager/servers: hierarchy and data structure diagrams
- xcloud/ssh-setup: SSH connection sequence diagram
- xcloud/updating-docker-apps: Docker update process diagrams
- bricks-builder-agent/index: agent overview and components
- bricks-builder-agent/workflow: agent workflow flowchart
- claude-code/index: configuration architecture diagram
- bcms/astra-agency-setup: build process and deployment diagrams
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs add astro.config.mjs src/components/KeyboardShortcuts.astro src/components/RelatedDocs.astro src/components/Steps.astro src/components/Tabs.astro src/components/TutorialProgress.astro src/content/docs/cloudflare/docs-site-setup.mdx src/content/docs/xcloud/ssh-setup.mdx)

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add UI/UX components for docs site

New components:
- RelatedDocs: "See also" links at bottom of pages
- Tabs: Tabbed content for multi-language code examples
- TutorialProgress: Progress tracker for multi-step tutorials
- Steps: Styled numbered step lists
- KeyboardShortcuts: Display available keyboard shortcuts

Config changes:
- Enable "Edit on GitHub" links via editLink config

Example usage added to:
- xcloud/ssh-setup.mdx - RelatedDocs component
- cloudflare/docs-site-setup.mdx - Tabs + RelatedDocs
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add sidebar expand/collapse and changelog badge

Sidebar improvements:
- Added Expand/Collapse all buttons at top of sidebar
- Allows quickly opening or closing all navigation sections

Changelog link:
- Added floating "What 's New" badge above other FABs
- Pulsing green dot indicates new content
- Links directly to /changelog/ page
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jb/jb-cloud-docs commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: move What''s New link to sidebar header

- Moved changelog link from floating badge to sidebar header
- Now sits alongside expand/collapse buttons
- Cleaner layout with icon buttons for expand/collapse
- Pulsing green dot indicates new content
EOF
\)")
Bash(CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=* npx wrangler pages project list:*)
